allow: Bash(powershell -Command "(Get-Content encryption.ts) -replace ''const iv = Buffer.from'', ''const _iv = Buffer.from'' | Set-Content encryption.ts")
Bash(powershell -Command "(Get-Content AuthContext.tsx) | Where-Object { $_ -notmatch ""import { User } from ''@/lib/supabase'';"" } | Set-Content AuthContext.tsx")
